heading: Overview
text: Book Name: MSc Research Methods 1 Assessments Labs.Summary: Assessment information lab resources Research Methods 1 course MSc Psychology conversion University Glasgow School Psychology & Neuroscience.Authors: James Bartlett & Phil McAleer.Aim: course covers introduces students quantitative research methods psychology. accompanying book course outline assessments, resources, lab materials one place.Contact: book living document regularly checked updated. issues using book queries, please contact James Bartlett Phil McAleer.
